title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 44.61 - State aid reimbursement; vector surveillance and control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 44.61 - State aid reimbursement; vector surveillance and control

State Regulations

The municipality must document within the State aid application, as a precondition for reimbursable vector surveillance and control (form DOH-0627- 2378), conditions supporting a public health threat. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
44.61

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
